  2. "Goodfellas" is another classic crime film directed by Martin Scorsese. It tells the story of Henry Hill (played by Ray Liotta), a young man from Brooklyn who gets involved with organized crime after a chance encounter with mob boss Joe Bonanno (played by Robert De Niro)).
Both movies are highly regarded in the world of cinema and have won numerous awards over the years.
